messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hi! I just created my user ID mei_patel_7272 and placed an order, but I have two issues. First, I think the 1000-piece intermediate jigsaw I ordered might be too difficult for my little kid—can I switch it to the easiest one with the fewest pieces? Second, I’m worried I might have typed my address wrong. Can you help me check it and update my order and user address if needed?
